mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.group_code AS "groupCode", a.line_no AS "lineNo", a.rule_code AS "ruleCode", a.data_set AS "dataSet", a.header_id AS "headerId", srwh.rule_name AS "ruleName", scds.name AS "dataSetName"
LEFT JOIN sys_common_data_set scds ON a.data_set = scds.code LEFT JOIN sys_wms_rule_wv_header srwh ON a.rule_code = srwh.rule_code AND a.data_set = srwh.data_set
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_wms_rule_wv_group_detail( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, rec_ver, group_code, line_no, rule_code, data_set, header_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{recVer}, #{groupCode}, #{lineNo}, #{ruleCode}, #{dataSet}, #{headerId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_wms_rule_wv_group_detail SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, rec_ver = rec_ver + 1, remarks = #{remarks}, group_code = #{groupCode}, line_no = #{lineNo}, rule_code = #{ruleCode}, data_set = #{dataSet}, header_id = #{headerId} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_wms_rule_wv_group_detail SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id}
